solution_line_template: Roberto skips {roberto_skips_per_minute} times per minute because {roberto_skips_per_hour} / {minutes_per_hour} = <<{roberto_skips_per_hour}/{minutes_per_hour}={roberto_skips_per_minute}>>{roberto_skips_per_minute}.
Together they skip {total_skips_per_minute} times a minute.
They will skip {total_skips} times because {total_skips_per_minute} x {jump_duration_minutes} = <<{total_skips_per_minute}*{jump_duration_minutes}={total_skips}>>{total_skips}
